content: **knit one change too ** 2024 update i designed this free pattern in 2017 to wear to protests with renewed hope i ask that you donate to the harris/walz campaign or your local democratic candidate perfect shawl to wear to your joyous warrior events when we fight we win this unisex patriotic shawlette is perfect for protesting in hotter summer months or just create a flag accessory for july 4th you can go for accuracy and create 50 stars or add more as desired for 50 stars you will need red 252 yards blue 44 yards white 272 yards i m new at this designer thing so please forgive me if there are mistakes this pattern has not been tech edited but the price is right to find more patterns or get our monthly craftivist newsletter check out our website https //www craftivist net we d love to have you join our **facebook group** https //www facebook com/groups/craftivist net/ ref=bookmarks or join our ravelry craftivist group http //www ravelry com/groups/craftivist and if you are just interested in daily visuals follow us on instagram https //www instagram com/craftivistgram/ knit one change too
